code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=()=>{alert('Login successful!');navigate('/home');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login to Your Account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",placeholder:"Enter your email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",placeholder:"Enter your password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-button",onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"})]})]});}export default Login;
